Darkfate::

Darkfate typed a secret menssage while he  was speaking with 
Orchestra.

Menssage said: A no agresion-deal had done with Alliance. Do you need 
troops to get our goals???  Be ready, a signal was sent from the ark. 
Chamaleon couldn't decode yet, I guess that it's a help-signal.
